TriggerOraclev10g.name: RACE_PARTICIPATION_BIKE_OWNER_TRIGGER
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE r_id rider.id%type; BEGIN SELECT RIDER_ID into r_id from BIKE where ID = :NEW.bike_id; IF :NEW.rider_id != r_id THEN raise_application_error(-20001, 'Rider id ' || TO_CHAR(:NEW.rider_id) || ' must match bike owner id'); end if; end;
